text: Pule Mabe (born 19 March 1980) is a South African politician and a member of the African National Congress. Mabe is the current spokesperson for the African National Congress the current ruling party of South Africa. Mabe succeeded Zizi Kodwa as the party's spokesperson. Born in Namakgale, Phalaborwa Limpopo province and is presently living in a government funded house in Steyn City. ==References== Category:Spokespersons Category:Members of the African National Congress Category:1960 births Category:Living people
title: Pule Mabe
